113.content:
Sonic pulled himself out of the vat, dripping with the chemicals,
"Gross!" he said in disgust. He tried best to shake off as much of
the stuff as he could, but it wouldn't come off. "Oh well," He sighed,
"I guess I'll just have to take a shower when I get to tails' place,
I'm sure he wont mind, sometimes it's practically like I live there!"
So the blue hedgehog, now covered in the greenish gunk started
off again, running to tails' house.

On the way to his buddy's house,Sonic didn't notice
what the chemical was doing, it traveled down his legs and into
his shoes! Shortly after arriving he noticed that the gunk was almost
completely gone, "I guess a run was all I needed to get that stuff off,
but something seems a bit wrong, it feels as if my shoes are tighter than
usual, probably just my imagination, those chemicals must've messed
with my head."

Sonic knocked, but no one answered, he then tried the knob,
but the door was locked, "Tails must be out testing some new
invention," he thought, "Well I'll just let myself in then." He pulled away
the false panel on the door to reveal a spare key, unlocked the door and
let himself in. Tails had a rule about not wearing shoes in his house so
the blue hedgehog did as his friend would want and removed his shoes
at the door, placing them on the rubber mat. "Ah, that feels much better."
He figured he might as well remove his socks too if he was going to take
a shower and he did. Sonic then made his way to the bathroom, his
bare feet making light slapping noises on the hard floor as he went.

"Whew,I could really use this right now," he said after turning on the
shower. He then stepped in, the hot water greeting him with a bit of a jolt,
forcing him to adjust the knob to a cooler temperature. As sonic took his
shower something was happening:
113.title: Strange Effects

132.content: "Oh man!" Tails said as he watched the strange liquid absorbed into his shoes. At first he thought his shoes were stained and infected from the chemical so he went to change them. As he pulls them off, he noticed that not a single place in his shoe was wet. Neither were his socks. Smelly, but not wet. His feet felt a bit wet, but he thought it was only sweat, since he was working for a while. "Oh well, I guess it was nothing. it probably evaporated quickly around my feet." Tails thought as he put his shoes back on. Suddenly his feet started to hurt. "Ow! What n the world? Why are my feet feeling constricted?" Tails says with a whine. He decides to take a nap, since he was sleepy anyway. In his bedroom, he was so tired he just plopped on his bed with his shoes on and quickly fell asleep. After a few minutes nto his nap, Tails feet started glowing through his shoes. The glow was a powerful deep blue, and with a hint of orange. The glow started to fade and Tails' feet started to grow slowly through his shoes. Tails himself was moaning in pain, yet also pleasure. His shoes seemed to be very stretchy and durable until Tails splayed his 3 toes in his sleep. The outer part of the shoes outstretch and popped up to his cuff. The straps that were keeping his shoes on had already popped off, but his feet ahd grown too much for them to come off. The layer under the outer started to mold into Tails' growing 3 toed feet. Suddenly the shoe went "BANG!!!" as the soles detached from the main part. Tails' acute fox hearing caught it as he sprang up from his pillow, just in tie to see his feet bursting through his shoes. "Wa..?" was the only thing he could say as his feet continued to grow. Then a series of pops and bangs echoed i his room from his now colossal feet breaking through the now unrecongizable shoes. "Ahhh, that's a whole lot better." Tails swung over and hopped off the bed. He grabs his ruler to see that he's gained two whole feet(no pun intended). Tails leans down and smelt his feet to make such that he wasn't dreaming. He nearly fainted from the smell of his paws. The potent smell started to grow along with his now 3' tall and 4' wide feet from before. "Hmm, I wonder what to do now that my feet are bigger." Tails ponders. "Oh I'll..
